nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story Look and Find

Solo: A Star Wars Story Look and Find is a children's activity book based on the film Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was published by Phoenix International Publications, Inc. on May 25, 2018 as part of its Look and Find series.

Join Han Solo and his friends, old and new, as you search for hidden treasures – and dangers – in 8 beautifully illustrated scenes from Solo: A Star Wars Story. Then blast to the back of the book for even more Look & Find challenges.
